message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $9,000.  It's in excellent condition and worth every penny.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, $9,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $7,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $7,500 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $8,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let me know if you're interested.
Alice, $8,500 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $8,250.  This is a fair price considering my budget and the value of the product.  Let me know what you think.
